pages.text: Many things can be controlled by redstone. You can choose out of the following:$(br2)$(l)Ignored:$()$(br)Redstone signals have no impact on the functionality of the device.$(br2)$(l)Active when high:$()$(br)The device will only work if a redstone signal of at least 1 is provided.

$(br2)$(l)Active when low:$()$(br)The device will only work if no redstone signal is provided.$(br2)$(l)Setpoint when level 15:$()$(br)This mode will change the actual output of the device closer to the set value, the closer the redstone signal gets to level 15. Only available for devices that have a selectable setpoint.
$(br2)$(l)Setpoint when level 0:$()$(br)Same like the previous except for when redstone signal gets closer to 0.
